verses.verse: Now <WG1161> the apostles<WG652> and<WG2532> the brethren<WG80> that<WG3588> were<WG5607> in<WG2596> Judaea<WG2449> heard<WG191> that<WG3754> the Gentiles<WG1484> also<WG2532> had<WG1209> received<WG1209> the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316>.

upon <WG1519> which<WG3739> when I had fastened mine eyes<WG816>, I considered<WG2657>, and<WG2532> saw<WG1492> the fourfooted beasts<WG5074> of the earth<WG1093> and<WG2532> wild beasts<WG2342> and<WG2532> creeping things<WG2062> and<WG2532> birds<WG4071> of the heaven<WG3772>.
And <WG1161> I heard<WG191> also a voice<WG5456> saying<WG3004> unto me<WG3427>, Rise<WG450>, Peter<WG4074>; kill<WG2380> and<WG2532> eat<WG5315>.

But <WG1161> I said<WG2036>, Not so<WG3365>, Lord<WG2962>: for<WG3754> nothing<WG3956> common<WG2839> or<WG2228> unclean<WG169> hath ever<WG3763> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> my<WG3450> mouth<WG4750>.

And <WG2532> behold<WG2400>, forthwith<WG1824> three<WG5140> men<WG435> stood before<WG2186> the<WG1909> house<WG3614> in<WG1722> which<WG3739> we were<WG1510>, having been sent<WG649> from<WG575> Caesarea<WG2542> unto<WG4314> me<WG3165>.

And <WG1161> as<WG1722> I<WG3165> began<WG756> to speak<WG2980>, the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> fell<WG1968> on<WG1909> them<WG846>, even<WG2532> as<WG5618> on<WG1909> us<WG2248> at<WG1722> the beginning<WG746>.

And <WG1161> I<WG3415> remembered the word<WG4487> of the Lord<WG2962>, how he<WG5613> said<WG3004>, John<WG2491> indeed<WG3303> baptized<WG907> with water<WG5204>; but<WG1161> ye<WG5210> shall be baptized<WG907> in<WG1722> the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151>.

If <WG1487> then3767, 5613 God<WG2316> gave<WG1325> unto them<WG846> the like<WG2470> gift<WG1431> as<WG2532> he did also unto us<WG2254>, when we believed<WG4100> on<WG1909> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG1161>, who<WG5101> was<WG2252> I<WG1473>, that I could<WG1415> withstand<WG2967> God<WG2316>?

And when<WG1161> they heard<WG191> these things<WG5023>, they held their peace<WG2270>, and<WG2532> glorified<WG1392> God<WG2316>, saying<WG3004>, Then<WG686> to the Gentiles<WG1484> also<WG2532> hath<WG1325> God<WG2316> granted<WG1325> repentance<WG3341> unto<WG1519> life<WG2222>.

And <WG1161> the report<WG3056> concerning<WG4012> them<WG846> came<WG191> to<WG1519> the ears<WG3775> of the church<WG1577> which was<WG3588> in<WG1722> Jerusalem<WG2414>: and<WG2532> they sent forth<WG1821> Barnabas<WG921> as<WG2193> far as<WG2193> Antioch<WG490>:

who <WG3739>, when he was come<WG3854>, and<WG2532> had seen<WG1492> the grace<WG5485> of God<WG2316>, was glad<WG5463>; and<WG2532> he exhorted<WG3870> them all<WG3956>, that with purpose<WG4286> of heart<WG2588> they would cleave<WG4357> unto the Lord<WG2962>:

for <WG3754> he was<WG2258> a good<WG18> man<WG435>, and<WG2532> full<WG4134> of the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> and<WG2532> of faith<WG4102>: and<WG2532> much<WG2425> people<WG3793> was added<WG4369> unto the Lord<WG2962>.

And<WG1161> it came to pass<WG1096>, that even for a whole<WG3650> year<WG1763> they were gathered<WG4863> together<WG846> with<WG1722> the church<WG1577>, and<WG2532> taught<WG1321> much<WG2425> people<WG3793>, and<WG5037> that the disciples<WG3101> were called<WG5537> Christians<WG5546> first<WG4412> in<WG1722> Antioch<WG490>.

And <WG1161> there stood up<WG450> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> them<WG846> named<WG3686> Agabus<WG13>, and signified<WG4591> by<WG1223> the Spirit<WG4151> that there should<WG3195> be<WG2071> a<WG2532> great<WG3173> famine<WG3042> over<WG1909> all<WG3650> the world<WG3625>: which<WG3748> came to pass<WG1096> in<WG1909> the days of<WG2541> Claudius<WG2804>.
